Text: Praise the LORD from the heavens; praise Him in the heights above.
Context: The psalmist opens with a call for the celestial beings to praise God.

Text: Praise Him, all His angels; praise Him, all His heavenly hosts.
Context: The scope of praise is broadened to include all spiritual beings.

Text: Praise Him, sun and moon; praise Him, all you shining stars.
Context: Celestial bodies are personified and called to praise God.

Text: Praise Him, highest heavens and the waters above the skies.
Context: The highest parts of the universe and the mysterious ”waters above“ are invoked in praise.

Text: Let them praise the name of the LORD, for He commanded and they were created.
Context: This provides the reason for praise - God’s command resulted in creation.

Text: He established them forever and ever; He issued a decree that will never pass away.
Context: Reflects on the permanence of God‘s creation and the enduring decree that governs it.

Text: Praise the LORD from the earth, you great sea creatures and all the depths,
Context: Transition from heavenly to earthly creation in the call to praise.

Text: lightning and hail, snow and clouds, stormy winds that fulfill His word,
Context: Natural phenomena are depicted as obedient servants of God’s word.

Text: mountains and all hills, fruit trees and all cedars,
Context: Different aspects of the earth continue the pattern of praise.

Text: wild animals and all cattle, crawling creatures and flying birds,
Context: Even animals are included in the psalmist‘s call to worship.

Text: kings of the earth and all nations, princes and all rulers of the earth,
Context: The call to praise extends to all levels of human society.

Text: young men and women, old men and children.
Context: Generational inclusivity in the worship of God is highlighted.

Text: Let them praise the name of the LORD, for His name alone is exalted; His splendor is above the earth and the heavens.
Context: This verse accentuates the uniqueness and majesty of God.

Text: He has raised up a horn for His people, the praise of all His saints, of the children of Israel, the people close to His heart. Praise the LORD!
Context: The focus narrows to God’s specific actions for His people, culminating in a final call to praise.
